DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect cesarean section perinatal mortality , use data provide Canadian Institute Health Information .
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Cesarean Section v Vaginal Delivery : Instrumental Variable Adjusted Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine administrative data provide Canadian Institute Health Information ( CIHI ) . Maternal obstetrical delivery neonatal hospitalization record provide CIHI link analysis . The primary outcome in-hospital perinatal mortality . The data analyze traditional multi-variate logistic regression , result analysis compare result instrumental variable adjust regression use Generalized Method Moments . The instrumental variable rate cesarean delivery among woman live within hospital catchment area . All analysis adjust maternal , infant , delivery provider , hospital factor , well cluster level delivery hospital .
DOC.criteria: Mothers live Canada infant deliver within study period Canadian hospital outside province Quebec . Maternal record linkable neonatal record . Multiple gestation . Birthweight < 500 gm . Gestational age delivery < 20 week . Deliveries hospital less 20 cesarean delivery study period . Records miss data important covariates
